description: Concatenate a columns values into a new column.

input.name: data
input.description: The datatable you want to concatenate on to.

input.name: columns
input.description: A list of columns from the data.

input.name: delimiter
input.description: Specifies a text to separate each value. Defaults to `""` (blank).

input.name: prefix
input.description: Specifies a text to be prefixed to each concatenated value. Defaults to `""` (blank).

input.name: postfix
input.description: Specifies a text to be postfixed to each concatenated value. Defaults to `""` (blank).

input.name: target
input.description: The name of the new column.

output.name: data
output.description: The data with the newly concatenated data and target column added.
